description: General event handlers for the series items. These event hooks can also be attached to the series at run time using the Highcharts.addEvent function.

children.name: afterAnimate
children.description: Fires after the series has finished its initial animation, or in case animation is disabled, immediately as the series is displayed.

children.name: checkboxClick
children.description: Fires when the checkbox next to the series' name in the legend is clicked. One parameter, event, is passed to the function. The state of the checkbox is found by event.checked. The checked item is found by event.item. Return false to prevent the default action which is to toggle the select state of the series.

children.name: click
children.description: Fires when the series is clicked. One parameter, event, is passed to the function, containing common event information. Additionally, event.point holds a pointer to the nearest point on the graph.

children.name: hide
children.description: Fires when the series is hidden after chart generation time, either by clicking the legend item or by calling .hide().

samples.name: Alert when the series is hidden by clicking the legend item

children.name: legendItemClick
children.description: Fires when the legend item belonging to the series is clicked. One parameter, event, is passed to the function. The default action is to toggle the visibility of the series. This can be prevented by returning false or calling event.preventDefault().

children.name: mouseOut
children.description: Fires when the mouse leaves the graph. One parameter, event, is passed to the function, containing common event information. If the stickyTracking option is true, mouseOut doesn't happen before the mouse enters another graph or leaves the plot area.

children.name: mouseOver
children.description: Fires when the mouse enters the graph. One parameter, event, is passed to the function, containing common event information.

children.name: show
children.description: Fires when the series is shown after chart generation time, either by clicking the legend item or by calling .show().

samples.name: Alert when the series is shown by clicking the legend item.
